channel.title: CVE Feed for apache -- ofbiz-framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for apache -- ofbiz-framework

item.title: CVE-2021-25958|2024-09-16T18:02:54.998Z -- apache -- ofbiz-framework
item.description: In Apache Ofbiz, versions v17.12.01 to v17.12.07 implement a try catch exception to handle errors at multiple locations but leaks out sensitive table info which may aid the attacker for further recon. A user can register with a very long password, but when he tries to login with it an exception occurs.
